simulation.world.environment.biome

Class Biome

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulation.world.environment.biome.Biome

  • public class Biome
extends java.lang.Object
    A biome definition. It is determined by a name and a climate. Every biome will have a different image.
    Author:
    CAMPS Aurèle
